name: files.remote.add
desc: A new file commenting experience arrived on July 23, 2018. Learn more about what's new and the migration path for apps already working with files and file comments.

external_id.desc: Creator defined GUID for the file.

title.desc: Title of the file being shared.

indexable_file_contents.desc: File containing contents that can be used to improve searchability for the remote file.

preview_image.desc: Preview of the document via multipart/form-data.

{
        "ok": true,
        "file": {
            "id": "F0GDJ3XMH",
            "created": 1563919925,
            "timestamp": 1563919925,
            "name": "LeadvilleAndBackAgain",
            "title": "LeadvilleAndBackAgain",
            "mimetype": "application/vnd.slack-remote",
            "filetype": "remote",
            "pretty_type": "Remote",

            "editable": false,
            "size": 0,
            "mode": "external",
            "is_external": true,
            "external_type": "app",
            "is_public": false,
            "public_url_shared": false,
            "display_as_bot": false,

errors.too_large: The uploaded image had excessive dimensions.
errors.invalid_external_id: The external_id provided is too long.
errors.bad_title: The title provided is too long.
errors.invalid_auth: Some aspect of authentication cannot be validated. Either the provided token is invalid or the request originates from an IP address disallowed from making the request.
errors.account_inactive: Authentication token is for a deleted user or workspace.
errors.token_revoked: Authentication token is for a deleted user or workspace or the app has been removed.
errors.no_permission: The workspace token used in this request does not have the permissions necessary to complete the request. Make sure your app is a member of the conversation it's attempting to post a message to.
errors.org_login_required: The workspace is undergoing an enterprise migration and will not be available until migration is complete.
errors.ekm_access_denied: Administrators have suspended the ability to post a message.

This includes very long names and names with non-alphanumeric characters other than _. If you get this error, it is typically an indication that you have made a very malformed API call.
